com.bandyer.android_sdk.screen_sharing.notification

Interface ScreenSharingNotificationListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionableNotification

    public ScreenSharingNotificationListener
extends ActionableNotification

    Listener for screen sharing generated notifications

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCreateNotification(ScreenShareInfo screenShareInfo, ScreenSharingNotificationType notificationType, ScreenSharingNotificationStyle notificationStyle)
      This method will be called when a notification is going to be displayed. The notification look&feel can be customized here.
      void onScreenSharingEvent(ScreenShare screenShare, boolean isDnd, boolean isScreenLocked)
      This method will be called when a screen share event has been started. Here it is possible to display or not the notification.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bandyer.android_sdk.notification.ActionableNotification

        onNotificationAction

    • Method Detail

      • onScreenSharingEvent

        void onScreenSharingEvent(ScreenShare screenShare,
                          boolean isDnd,
                          boolean isScreenLocked)

        This method will be called when a screen share event has been started. Here it is possible to display or not the notification.

        Parameters:
        screenShare - ScreenShare event
        isDnd - True if the device is in do not disturb mode, false otherwise
        isScreenLocked - True if the device has the screen locked,false otherwise

      • onCreateNotification

        void onCreateNotification(ScreenShareInfo screenShareInfo,
                          ScreenSharingNotificationType notificationType,
                          ScreenSharingNotificationStyle notificationStyle)

        This method will be called when a notification is going to be displayed. The notification look&feel can be customized here.

        Parameters:
        screenShareInfo - Information about the screen share info
        notificationStyle - Customizable notification style that will be displayed
        notificationType - Notification type
